addr: 355 Lexington Avenue, 3rd Floor New York, NY 10017
title: PAWS NY Volunteer Orientation- December 3rd, 6pm
desc: Pets Are Wonderful Support (PAWS NY) is a grassroots, volunteer-driven organization.? If you enjoy spending time with both people and pets, we offer wonderful opportunities for our volunteers (18 years old+)*?to provide direct services to our clients, mainly through our? . ?Volunteers help walk dogs, clean the litter box, transport to the vet, and other daily tasks are clients are struggling to do on their own. ?Volunteers are asked to make the following minimum commitment: at least one visit per week for at least 6 months. In order to begin providing services, all volunteers are required to attend an orientation.? You will learn more about PAWS NY and the services you will ultimately provide to our clients, so please sign up today.? We hope you will join us! Light snacks and beverages will be provided, and please? . For more information on PAWS NY, please visit our website at www.pawsny.org. Sincerely, Rachel Herman Founder and Executive Director www.pawsny.org
